entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
